content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-15.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-15.0, -49.0) with a status of working, processing iron ore into iron plates.

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (40.0, -84.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (40.0, -84.0) extracting coal, with a drop position at (40.5, -82.5).
- Wooden Chest at position (40.5, -82.5) storing coal, currently full.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -83.5) adjacent to the mining drill.

### Iron Plate Transfer System at Position (54.5, -83.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Inserter at position (54.5, -83.5) transferring items from a chest at (56.5, -83.5).
- Wooden Chest at position (56.5, -83.5) storing iron plates.

### Iron Storage Facility at Position (0.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron Chest at position (0.5, 0.5) storing iron plates.
- Iron Chest at position (1.5, 0.5) currently empty.

### Belt System
Consists of the following entities:
- BeltGroup connecting various positions for item transfer, including coal transport.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors Due to Full Inventory
- Ensure your inventory has enough space before attempting to harvest resources. Consider crafting or storing items to free up space.

### Errors When Harvesting Resources
- Verify that the target resource patch is accessible and that your inventory can accommodate the harvested quantity.
